original_text: He saw a well in a field. Three groups of sheep lay near it. Shepherds took water from the well to give to their sheep. There was a large stone that covered the top of the well.
korean_text: 본즉 들에 우물이 있고 그 곁에 양 세 떼가 누워 있으니 이는 목자들이 그 우물에서 양 떼에게 물을 먹임이라 큰 돌로 우물 아귀를 덮었다가

sentences.original_text: He saw a well in a field.
Three groups of sheep lay near it.
sentences.korean_translation: 세 그룹의 양들이 그것 근처에 누워 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Shepherds took water from the well
that covered the top of the well.
